promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a dynamic epic lizard fighting-type pokemon wearing a dark crown. It can be found in canyon-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, fighting or lizard. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Canyrogue, a a dynamic epic lizard fighting-type pokemon. It can be found in canyon-like environments It has the following abilities: Trembling Ground, Mountain Hunt. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "lizard", "fighting" or "Canyrogue". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of fighting-type pokemon, lizard-like, epic, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, galaxy background
generatedDescription: Canyrogue, the agile canyon warrior, thrives in rocky terrains. With Trembling Ground, it triggers avalanches while Mountain Hunt enables stealthy prey stalking.
